response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,500,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would significantly benefit you and align well with your needs and goals.

To make this offer more appealing, I am extending a special deal to you. I propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,350,000. This represents a significant saving of $150,000 compared to its original valuation, making it a compelling investment for you.

Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
